column2: U.S. Greenhouse Gas Emissions by Economic Sector (MMT CO2 eq.)
Environmental Protection Agency, U.S. Greenhouse Gas Inventory Data Explorer (cfpub.epa.gov/ghgdata/inventoryexplorer/index.html)

Emissions values are presented in million metric tons carbon dioxide equivalent using Fourth Assessment Report (AR4) global warming potential (GWP) values established by the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC).
MMT CO2 eq.: million metric tons carbon dioxide equivalent
IPCC: Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change
